    • Constructor Detail

      • MapEditorController

        public MapEditorController()
        USe this constructor if there are no specific gameplay classes. The editor then chooses some basic classes.

      • MapEditorController

        public MapEditorController(GameView gameplayView,
                           Controller gameplayController)
        Create an editor controller with coresponding gameplay classes.
        Parameters:
        gameplayView - the old gameplay classes. If null: the editor then chooses a basic view.
        gameplayController - the old gameplay classes. If null: the editor then chooses a basic controller.
